workflowInfo.workflowDescription: Provision an IBM Integration Broker instance. Build for FTM. Based on Message Broker v9.

variable.name: ZOSMF_RACF_USER
variable.label: ZOSMF_RACF_USER
variable.description: RACF Admin userid used for provisioning that has extra authority.

variable.name: IIB_QMGR_NAME
variable.label: IIB_QMGR_NAME
variable.description: Queue Manager name for this Broker

variable.name: IIB_RUNASUSER
variable.label: IIB_RUNASUSER
variable.description: IB broker stc usr. but as workaround for zOSMF now in separate variable for flexibility

variable.name: IIB_EXG_NAMEBASE
variable.label: IIB_EXG_NAMEBASE
variable.description: first characters of exec grp name

variable.name: ZOSMF_INSTALL_USER
variable.label: ZOSMF_INSTALL_USER
variable.abstract: UserID under which install jobs will run
variable.description: UserID under which ZOSMF install jobs will run

variable.name: IIB_MQ_PATH
variable.label: Tha path to MQ unix libs
variable.abstract: MQ path in use for broker
variable.description: MQ path in use for broker

variable.name: IIB_BROKER_SEQ
variable.label: IIB_BROKER_SEQ
variable.description: Broker sequence nummer on the lpar, for example IBO13X

variable.name: ZOSMF_INSTANCE
variable.label: ZOSMF_INSTANCE
variable.description: THe ZOSMF Instance name such as ZOSWFSO1

variable.name: ZOSMF_INSTANCE_RUNASGRP
variable.label: ZOSMF_INSTANCE_RUNASGRP
variable.description: Group for RUNASUSER authorisation for this instances

variable.name: IIB_WORK_DIR_SYMLINK
variable.label: IIB_WORK_DIR_SYMLINK
variable.description: Symbolic link for IIB work directory, such as /var/mqsi/brokers/BROKERNAME This points to /plex/var/mqsi/brokers/BROKERNAME

variable.name: IIB_DB2_DS_PREFIX
variable.label: IIB_DB2_DS_PREFIX
variable.description: Generic prefix for DB2 datasets, for example SYS3. Will be appended with subsystem in the flow.

variable.name: IIB_DB2_DS_SUBSYS_PREFIX
variable.label: IIB_DB2_DS_SUBSYS_PREFIX
variable.description: IIB_DB2_DS_SUBSYS_PREFIX - prefeix for Db2 datasets for the DB2 subsystems being used.

variable.name: IIB_BROKER_PORT_ID
variable.label: Id for dynamically obtained broker port
variable.abstract: Id for dynamically obtained broker port
variable.description: Id for dynamically obtained broker port

variable.name: RABO_INSTANCEID
variable.label: RABO_INSTANCEID
variable.description: The unique instance name in Rabobank

step.name: setVariables
step.title: Specify IIB parameters
step.description: Sets the parameters required for the IIB.
step.instructions: Specify the parameters required for IIB.

step.name: DeriveVariables
step.title: DeriveVariables
step.description: This step derives values for variables from the values of the variables provided on the workflow instantiation. Aim is to make the workflow more readable by creating specific variables once and use these in the steps instead of using more complex expressions of multiple variables.
step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: DisplayVariables Update this field with your own text

step.name: DisplayVariables
step.title: DisplayVariables
step.description: Displays variable values to make debugging of the workflow easier.
step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: DisplayVariables Update this field with your own text

step.name: obtainPort
step.title: Obtain TCP port for Broker
step.description: Obtain a TCP port for the broker web admin UI. The port comes from the pool defined in the z/OSMF resources.
step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: obtainPort Update this field with your own text

step.name: DefineandAuthorizeUsers
step.title: DefineandAuthorizeUsers
step.description:
Define and Authorize Broker User and database access users. Groups and profiles required are assumed a prereq to this workflow.
Improvement: better error handling. Probably needs a rexx to fire commands and catch resuts of commands.
step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: AuthorizeRunAsUser Update this field with your own text

template.inlineTemplate:
//RACFDEFS EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,REGION=0M //* Group definitions are prereq to this workflow //SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=* //* The following definitions must be made //SYSTSIN DD * ## set variables #set ($IIB_STCUSER = "${instance-IIB_BROKER_NAME}U") #set ($IIB_HOME_DIR = "/u/miscuser/${instance-IIB_BROKER_NAME.toLowerCase()}u") ##variable for MQCONN BATCH PROFILE RACF #set ($MC1 = ${instance-IIB_QMGR_NAME.substring(0,1)} ) #set ($MC2 = "%" ) #set ($MC34 = ${instance-IIB_QMGR_NAME.substring(2,4)} ) #set ($MQCONNBATCH = "${MC1}${MC2}${MC34}" )
adduser $IIB_STCUSER owner(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) dfltgrp(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) altuser $IIB_STCUSER name('STC-USER TBV BROKER') altuser $IIB_STCUSER nopassword nooidcard connect $IIB_STCUSER group(${instance-IIB_STCGROUP}) owner(${instance-IIB_STCGROUP}) - auth(USE) uacc(NONE) connect $IIB_STCUSER group(OMEGAMON) owner(OMEGAMON) - auth(USE) uacc(NONE)
altuser $IIB_STCUSER omvs(home('$IIB_HOME_DIR')) altuser $IIB_STCUSER omvs(program('/bin/sh')) altuser $IIB_STCUSER - omvs(uid(${instance-IIB_STCUSER_UID}) shared)
connect $IIB_STCUSER group(FUSTCBRK)
connect $IIB_STCUSER group(${instance-ZOSMF_INSTANCE_RUNASGRP})
rdefine STARTED ${instance-IIB_BROKER_NAME}.** owner(GRZOS) - audit(failures(READ)) uacc(NONE) ralter STARTED ${instance-IIB_BROKER_NAME}.** - stdata(user($IIB_STCUSER)) setropts refresh raclist(STARTED)
rdefine STARTED ${instance-IIB_BROKER_NAME}J.** owner(GRZOS) - audit(failures(READ)) uacc(NONE) ralter STARTED ${instance-IIB_BROKER_NAME}J.** - stdata(user($IIB_STCUSER)) setropts refresh raclist(STARTED) /* //RACFAU EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,DYNAMNBR=20,COND=(EVEN) //SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=* //SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=* //SYSTSIN DD *
PE ${instance-ZOSMF_INSTANCE}.ZOSMF.TEMPLATE.RUNASUSERS.${_workflow-domainID}.${_workflow-templateName} - CLASS(ZMFCLOUD) ID($IIB_STCUSER) ACCESS(READ) PE ${MQCONNBATCH}.BATCH CL(MQCONN) ID(${instance-ZOSMF_INSTALL_USER}) ACCESS(READ) PE *.DELETE.QLOCAL CL(MQCMDS) ID($IIB_STCUSER) ACCESS(ALTER)
PE IEFUSI.PLUS256 CLASS(FACILITY) ID($IIB_STCUSER) ACCESS(READ) PE IEFUSI.PLUS256 CLASS(FACILITY) ID(${instance-ZOSMF_INSTALL_USER}) ACCESS(READ)
SETROPTS RACLIST(ZMFCLOUD) REFRESH SETROPTS RACLIST(FACILITY) REFRESH
/* //RACFDEFS EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,REGION=0M //* Group definitions are prereq to this workflow //SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=* //SYSTSIN DD * adduser ${instance-IIB_XDBC_USER} owner(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) - dfltgrp(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) altuser ${instance-IIB_XDBC_USER} name('FTM USER TBV Broker ODBC') - PASSWORD(${instance-IIB_xDBC_PW})
#set ($IIB_XDBC_HOME_DIR = "/u/miscuser/${instance-IIB_XDBC_USER.toLowerCase()}") connect ${instance-IIB_XDBC_USER} group(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) - owner(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) auth(USE) uacc(NONE) altuser ${instance-IIB_XDBC_USER} omvs(home('$IIB_XDBC_HOME_DIR')) altuser ${instance-IIB_XDBC_USER} omvs(program('/bin/sh')) altuser ${instance-IIB_XDBC_USER} omvs(uid(${instance-IIB_XDBCUSER_UID}) shared)
adduser ${instance-IIB_WAS_USER} owner(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) dfltgrp(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) altuser ${instance-IIB_WAS_USER} name('FTM USER TBV WAS JDBC') PASSWORD(${instance-WAS_PW})
#set ($IIB_WAS_HOME_DIR = "/u/miscuser/${instance-IIB_WAS_USER.toLowerCase()}") connect ${instance-IIB_WAS_USER} group(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) - owner(${instance-IIB_STCDFLTGROUP}) auth(USE) uacc(NONE) altuser ${instance-IIB_WAS_USER} omvs(home('${instance-IIB_WAS_HOME_DIR}')) altuser ${instance-IIB_WAS_USER} omvs(program('/bin/sh')) altuser ${instance-IIB_WAS_USER} omvs(uid(${instance-IIB_WASUSER_UID}) shared) /*

step.name: CreateDB2ParmlibMember
step.title: Update parmlib
step.description: Creates a DB2 configuration member DSNAOINI for the ODBC connection with Db2. COuld be in any PDS reference in the broker's ENVFILE.
step.instructions: Run job UPDPRML.jcl.

step.name: CreateStartedTaskJCL
step.title: Update STCproc
step.description: Add an procedure to a proclib library to start broker. We have a dedicated proclib for z/OSMF managed procedures, SYS3.<zosmfinstance>.STCPROC.
step.instructions: Run job UPDSTC.jcl.

step.name: CreateMountCommand
step.title: Create Mount Command
step.description:
Create mount command file to ensure file system is remounted after IPL.
Creates /var/zosmf/data/mountzfs${instance-IIB_BROKER_NAME_LC}.sh a command file in /
step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: CreateMountCommand Update this field with your own text

step.name: CreateBrokerhomedir
step.title: CreateHomeDirectory
step.description: Create home directory for the Broker and set ownership and permission bits..
step.instructions: Run job createhomedir.jcl.

step.name: CreateBrokerworkfilesystem
step.title: CreateBrokerWorkFilesystem
step.description: Create global Broker Work filesystem (/var/mqsi/...) and format.
step.instructions: Run job createworkfs.jcl.

step.name: Createmountpoint
step.title: Create mountpoint for the broker work file system
step.description: Create Broker file system mount point and mount file system at global mountpoint: /plex/var/mqsi/brokers/<broker> Will be linked to via symlinks, see next steps.
step.instructions: Run job createmountpt.jcl.

step.name: CreateSymlinksforBrokerFS-NOT-for-XAT
step.title: CreateSymlinksforBrokerFS-NOT-for-XAT
step.description: Create symlinks for broker file system: /<system>/var/mqsi/brokers/<broker> points to /plex/var/mqsi/berokers/<broker>. This step is for all sysplexes but XAT.

condition.description: For all systems except XAT this step is valid

step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: CreateSymlinksforBrokerFS Update this field with your own text

step.name: CreateSymlinksforBrokerFSonXATOnly
step.title: CreateSymlinksforBrokerFSonXATOnly
step.description: Create symlinks for broker file system: /<system>/var/mqsi/brokers/<broker> points to /plex/var/mqsi/berokers/<broker>. This step is for XAT only.

condition.description: On XAT only this step is valid

step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: CreateSymlinksforBrokerFS Update this field with your own text

step.name: CreateBipprofFromTemplate
step.title: Create IIB BIPPROF from template
step.description: Create IIB BIPPROF broker profile file from template. Runs under broker userID to set permissions correctly.
step.instructions: Create BIPPROF from template. Copies customized bipprof file to Broker home directory

step.name: CreateEnvironmentFile
step.title: Create ENVFILE from BIPPROF created in previous step
step.description: Create IIB environment file ENVFILE from profile BIPPROF created in previous step. Runs under broker userID to set permission correctly at once.
step.instructions:
Generated instruction text for step: CreateEnvironmentFile Update this field with your own text
Must run under Broker userID

step.name: CreateIIBtmpdirectories
step.title: Creation of IIB tmp directories
step.description: Creates broker tmp directories.
step.instructions: Run job CRENWDR.jcl.

step.name: CreateBroker
step.title: Create broker
step.description: Create broker using mqsi command.
step.instructions: Run job CreateBroker.jcl.

step.name: AuthoriseDirectories
step.title: Authorisations directories
step.description: Set authorisations on directories such that access is limited to functions that needs access.
step.instructions: Run job AUTHFS.jcl.

step.name: CreateBrokerqueues
step.title: Create Broker queues
step.description: Create broker queues using mqsi command.
step.instructions: Run job CreateBrokerQueues.jcl. Run with Broker userid.

step.name: SetWebAdminSecurity
step.title: Set Web Admin security - currently to off only
step.description: Set Web Admin security - currently switched off only.
step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: EnableWebAdminSecurity Enable the Web UI

step.name: StartBroker
step.title: Start Broker
step.description: Start the Broker for final customization. Enhancement: use better way to fire operator commands.
step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: StartBroker Update this field with your own text

step.name: SetIIBWebAdminPort
step.title: Change port number for the web admin
step.description: Set web admin port for the broker.
step.instructions: Run job CHAPORT.jcl.

step.name: DBConnectiondefs
step.title: DB connectivity jdbc odbc
step.description: Define broker's odbc and jdbc connections.
step.instructions: Run job DBCDEFS.jcl.

step.name: CreateExecutionGroups
step.title: Create Execution Groups for this broker
step.description: Create execution groups, complying with naming standards. THis step creates 2.
step.instructions: Run job CRE6EXG.jcl.

step.name: AuthorizeProductionUser
step.title: Production user authorisation
step.description: Authorize production user for access to brokers directories.
step.instructions: Run job PRDAUDP.jcl.

step.name: AuthorizeTivoliUser
step.title: tivoli auth
step.description: Authorize Tivoliuser for access to brokers directories.
step.instructions: Run job TIVAUTH.jcl.

step.name: AuthoriseDirectories2
step.title: Authorise directories 2nd time
step.description: Second run to set permissions, for unclear reasons fixes remaining issues.
step.instructions: Generated instruction text for step: AuthoriseDirectories2 Update this field with your own text
